This document presents some preliminary analyses characterizing the NDVI of certain places and census tracts throughout the Denver metro area.

# Outline  
1. Characterize NDVI of certain places
2. Characterize NDVI of census tracts

```{r mapview, eval=TRUE, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=TRUE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(mapview)

setwd(here("data-processed"))
load("places_native_geo.RData")
places_native_geo %>% 
  mapview(zcol = "place_type",
          layer.name = "Place category")
```
